segments.text: I see the water overflowing and I feel a sense of disgust.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor looks dirty and slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in it, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being quite sneaky, taking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing precariously on a stool, reaching for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit sick watching him, knowing he could fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting eagerly, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a bit nauseating, to be honest.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how careless everyone is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like looking away, but I can't help but watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
